name: Wisdom Meditation Cushion - Handpainted Silk
description: Description Overview Leyla Navab ArtSilk's collection of meditation cushions is inspired by the colors of the seven chakras. Each meditation cushion is created with the intention to inspire the characteristics of its pertaining chakra color. The meditation cushion is made out of a hand-painted design on silk charmeuse, which is then lined with silk dupioni. The texture of the silk helps enter a stage of relaxation and total peace. Padding is also added to allow extra comfort. The Beauty Meditation Cushion is inspired by the seventh chakra; the crown chakra. This chakra is represented by the color violet and it is a symbol of beauty, creativity, inspiration, peace, wisdom, and unity. Fabric and Care 100% Silk Charmeuse lined with 100% Dupioni Silk. MicroSafe Batting used for padding. French Gutta Serti Technique Size Standard Size: 27" x 21" Large Size: 30" x 26"

name: Sunshine Orchids Portrait - Handpainted Silk
description: Description Overview Nature is ArtSilk's inspiration and this is beautifully reflected through this new limited collection of Orchid Portraits. The silk charmeuse starts completely white (like all other ArtSilk items) and the orchids are painted by hand with a brush. The three-dimensional color brings the orchids to life and amazingly allows for the portrait to reflect the natural healing powers of this magnificent flower. This luxurious silk portrait brings the graceful presence of nature into your everyday existence. Fabric and Care 100% Silk Charmeuse stretched on a wooden frame French Gutta Serti Technique Size 16"x14"

name: Moss Green Leaves Silk Shibori Scarf - Handpainted Silk Shibori
description:
Description 

Overview 
At Leyla Navab ArtSilk we created our own special and unique process of shibori dyeing. The silk is dyed for the first time in one complete color with a brush; after it has dried, the silk is then tightly wrapped; this wrapping process gives the silk its beautiful and unique pleating. While it is wrapped, dye is applied to the scarf for a second time, again using a brush and being very attentive to the color harmony and effect we want to create. The dye is set, the silk unwrapped, and every time we spread the pleating to observe the color, we become fascinated by the gracefulness of the silk and its ability to make colors energetic and stunning.
 
Fabric and Care 
100% Crinkle Silk 
Shibori Technique - Double Sided
Dry clean only 

Size 
60" X 3"

name: Wild Tulips Shawl - Handpainted Silk
description: Description Overview Our silk chiffon shawls gracefully showcase every attention to detail that silk painting requires. The design is drawn freehand on the silk using a gutta outline, which is then colored with silk ink using the appropriate brushes. The harmony of color is created with the intention to inspire a feeling of beauty and luxury. The magnificence of the silk aids in bringing out the essence of color, which combined with the original artwork, creates a magical and exquisite silk accessory. Our designs are made to order. Please allow five business days to receive your Leyla Navab ArtSilk item. Fabric and Care 3mm 100% Silk Chiffon French Gutta Serti Technique Pre-washed Hand-washable Size 84” x 36”

The design is drawn freehand on the silk using a gutta outline, which is then colored with silk ink using the appropriate brushes. The harmony of color is created with the intention to inspire a feeling of beauty and luxury. The magnificence of the silk aids in bringing out the essence of color, which combined with the original artwork, creates a magical and exquisite silk accessory. Our designs are made to order. Please allow five business days to receive your Leyla Navab ArtSilk item. Fabric and Care 3mm 100% Silk Chiffon French Gutta Serti Technique Pre-washed Hand-washable Size 84” x 36”
